hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Umar: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade two kinds of food: to sit at cloth on which wine is drunk, and to eat by a man while lying on his stomach. Abu Dawud said : Ja'far did not hear this tradition from al-Zuhri. His tradition is rejected

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْجُلُوسِ عَلَى مَائِدَةٍ عَلَيْهَا بَعْضُ مَا يُكْرَهُ
chapter.eng-name: Sitting at a table on which there are some things that are disliked
